alert.note: Alert for Northern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 13 at 4:19AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 15 inches. * WHERE...Northern Herkimer County. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The weight of the heavy wet snow on tree branches will likely result in power outages. Snowfall rates in excess of 1 inch per hour are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a long duration and high- impact snow event. Prepare now for this upcoming winter storm.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
